name: MyShell: AI Photo Generator
subtitle: AI Photo Generator
description: Transform photos instantly! Create stunning AI art, realistic face swaps, and dynamic videos in seconds. The ultimate creative studio for avatars & editing is here.

apps.name: MyShell: AI Photo Generator
apps.localizedDescription: Transform photos instantly! Create stunning AI art, realistic face swaps, and dynamic videos in seconds. The ultimate creative studio for avatars & editing is here.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This allows MyShell to take photos to be included in your messages.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: You can chat with bots using your voice.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This allows MyShell to attach photos from your library to your messages.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Give MyShell permission to save photos
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: We use this data to help us personalize your experience.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need your location to provide local services.
